", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The IPL Centre for Rural Outreach (ICRO) established under the Indian Potash Limited (IPL), Department of Fertilizers, Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers, has launched ICRO Amrit Internship Programme focused on youth productivity for prosperity. The interns will be placed at the headquarters and Regional Offices of NPC/ IPL. The duration of the internship will be 3 months initially which can be renewed up to 4 times.
